name: /E Free: The Game
description:
This is a game I made on scratch, it's just a small game about /e free, and how it can ether give you nothing or something or something other than something, so don't expect dark souls

There is 80 endings in the game right now.

/e free is a common """command""" used in Roblox, it's ment to make an item free, however that is just a myth, I'm not sure who started the whole "/e free makes an item free!!!" myth but it's pretty funny considering on almost any item you will see /e free.

Updates (updates v0 - v0.4 are on the Old Version)

v0.5 - Game Uploaded to Newgrounds and Itch.io - 80 Endings - Updated buying screen - Added title screen - 7/13/2022

v0.6 - Fixed bug where game would not start after typing - 7/13/2022
